title: [Large-Scale] Database Modeling Education Using Visual Abstraction Layers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental database concepts (tables, relationships, etc.)
context.additional_context: Centered on smartphone-based learning activities, with practical feedback provided in face-to-face sessions

learning_goals: Learners can generate conceptual database models by applying the four-level abstraction hierarchy (Task-Semantics-Syntax-Lexical).
Learners can explain the visual transition process between ER diagrams and relational schemas and perform error-free mapping.
Learners can recognize cognitive load during database modeling and evaluate problem-solving skills using visualization strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
